AboutMe.ShortDescription: With five years of experience in eCommerce, I have developed a deep understanding of digital processes and user-centric solutions. My passion for technology and innovation has driven me to further qualify as a frontend developer. My goal is to create intuitive and high-performance digital products that inspire both businesses and users alike.

MainInfo.Headline: PROJECTS
MainInfo.Description: Here you will find some of my recent projects, showcasing my skills in frontend development. My work revolves around creating interactive, responsive, and user-friendly web applications that provide seamless digital experiences.

Join.Title: Join
Join.Description: A Kanban board group project that enables task management like Trello, with features for creating tasks, assigning contacts, and more.
Join.implemetationDetails: This was a team project with four members. I was responsible for designing and implementing the registration and login logic, as well as developing the drag & drop functionality for the board, including its UI. Additionally, I styled and coded the task detail view.

El Pollo Loco.Title: El Pollo Loco
El Pollo Loco.Description: A fun jump & run game written in JavaScript. Help Pepe find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

Portfolio.Title: Portfolio
Portfolio.Description: A modern portfolio website built with Angular 19, TypeScript, and Standalone Components. Showcasing my projects and skills in a high-performance and scalable web application.
